Posts.Content: hi  that's really good. newly diagnosed people must need these type of video/prog. I don't know rest of people reaction but people like me(anxious) they start doing lots of research that's make more tensed. and one more thing i really like support group because u cant ask many question from doc due to shock ..........so later on many questions raise in mind so these support groups helps a lot.  Thanks
Posts.Title: The Big C & Me
